price: “Sila yeroo duunee biyyee taane (ni kaafamnaa)? Sun deebii fagoodha.”(jedhu).
arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban dhālika rajʿun baʿīdun
